sentences: Kinnitasin oma jõudu puhkamise ja einega.
context: The Estonian word 'kinnitan' is the 1st person singular present tense form of the verb 'kinnitama'. It means to confirm, verify, substantiate or validate something. This can involve physical attachment (like securing objects together), making stronger/more durable (strengthening), proving the truth or correctness of something, emphasizing a statement, approving decisions officially, or ensuring safety/coverage.
